Comrade Klaymore

About ~ Comic ~ Videos

This website is running on a computer I found on the side of the road. If stuff isn't working or being weird I'm probably messing with something. Also my internet turns off from 21:50 to like 5:30.

My server's running NixOS and using Nginx for the website. The website's coded in HTML, CSS, and I'm working on Javascript and PHP.

I've also made some videos on Youtube.

My sister has made some cool animations.
